name: Guardian Angels (Jose Ignacio Pintado Murillo, Sofía de Vega Giménez)
name_original: Guardian Angels (Jose Ignacio Pintado Murillo, Sofía de Vega Giménez)
description:
Guardian Angels is a  Shoot'em up mobile game where the player has to defend the Earth from the alien threat

You can choose your favorite angel (Heaven, Justice or Eden) and control her ship to defeat the villains

During the game, the angel have to stay alive and complete the objectives of her star mission.

Made with Android Studio
